mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW R, USERORDER_DETAIL D, USER_ORDER O, PRODUCT P WHERE R.ORDER_DETAIL_ID = D.ORDER_DETAIL_ID AND D.ORDER_ID = O.ORDER_ID AND D.PRODUCT_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID
AND R.REVIEW_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
AND P.PRODUCT_ID = TO_NUMBER(#{searchKeyword})
AND P.PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
AND P.CATEGORY_CODE = 1
AND P.CATEGORY_CODE = 2
ORDER BY O.ORDER_DATE DESC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R_NUM, A.* FROM (SELECT R.*, O.ORDER_DATE, P.PRODUCT_ID, P.PRODUCT_NAME, D.USER_ID, P.CATEGORY_CODE FROM REVIEW R, USERORDER_DETAIL D, USER_ORDER O, PRODUCT P WHERE R.ORDER_DETAIL_ID = D.ORDER_DETAIL_ID AND D.ORDER_ID = O.ORDER_ID AND D.PRODUCT_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID
AND R.REVIEW_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
AND P.PRODUCT_ID = TO_NUMBER(#{searchKeyword})
AND P.PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
AND P.CATEGORY_CODE = 1
AND P.CATEGORY_CODE = 2
ORDER BY O.ORDER_DATE DESC) A) WHERE R_NUM BETWEEN TO_NUMBER(#{start}) AND TO_NUMBER(#{end})

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R_NUM, A.* FROM (SELECT R.REVIEW_GRADE, R.REVIEW_CONTENT, U.USER_NICKNAME ,UO.ORDER_DATE,R.REVIEW_ID FROM REVIEW R, USERS U, USER_ORDER UO, USERORDER_DETAIL D, PRODUCT P WHERE R.ORDER_DETAIL_ID = D.ORDER_DETAIL_ID AND D.ORDER_ID = UO.ORDER_ID AND D.PRODUCT_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID AND UO.USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND P.PRODUCT_ID = #{product_id} ORDER BY R.REVIEW_ID DESC) A) WHERE R_NUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT R.REVIEW_GRADE, R.REVIEW_CONTENT, U.USER_NICKNAME ,UO.ORDER_DATE FROM REVIEW R, USERS U, USER_ORDER UO, USERORDER_DETAIL D, PRODUCT P WHERE R.ORDER_DETAIL_ID = D.ORDER_DETAIL_ID AND D.ORDER_ID = UO.ORDER_ID AND D.PRODUCT_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID AND UO.USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND P.PRODUCT_ID = #{product_id} ORDER BY R.REVIEW_ID DESC

SELECT R.REVIEW_GRADE, R.REVIEW_CONTENT,P.PRODUCT_NAME, D.USER_ORDER_CNT, P.PRODUCT_INFO,R.REVIEW_ID FROM REVIEW R, USER_ORDER O, USERORDER_DETAIL D, PRODUCT P WHERE R.ORDER_DETAIL_ID = D.ORDER_DETAIL_ID AND D.ORDER_ID = O.ORDER_ID AND D.PRODUCT_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID AND R.REVIEW_ID = #{review_id}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R_NUM, A.* FROM (SELECT P.PRODUCT_INFO, P.PRODUCT_NAME, U.ORDER_DATE, R.REVIEW_GRADE, R.REVIEW_CONTENT, R.REVIEW_ID FROM REVIEW R, PRODUCT P, USER_ORDER U, USERORDER_DETAIL D WHERE R.ORDER_DETAIL_ID = D.ORDER_DETAIL_ID AND D.ORDER_ID = U.ORDER_ID AND D.PRODUCT_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID AND U.USER_ID = #{user_id} ORDER BY R.REVIEW_ID DESC) A) WHERE R_NUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW R, PRODUCT P, USER_ORDER U, USERORDER_DETAIL D WHERE R.ORDER_DETAIL_ID = D.ORDER_DETAIL_ID AND D.ORDER_ID = U.ORDER_ID AND D.PRODUCT_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID AND U.USER_ID = 'me' ORDER BY R.REVIEW_ID DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW (REVIEW_ID,REVIEW_CONTENT,REVIEW_GRADE,ORDER_DETAIL_ID) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(REVIEW_ID)+1,0) FROM REVIEW), #{review_content}, #{review_grade},#{order_detail_id})
